description:
Tomoya, Aoi, and Ryou are high school students who met online. An urban legend speaks of a "summer ghost," a spirit girl who appears when fireworks are set off.

Tomoya cannot live the life he envisioned for himself. Aoi cannot find her place in the world. Ryou has his once shining future suddenly pulled away. Each has their own reason for needing to meet the summer ghost. On a summer night when life and death cross paths, where will each of their emotions take them?

tags.name: Ghost
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a ghost.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Afterlife
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the afterlife.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Suicide
tags.description: The act or an instance of taking or attempting to take one's own life voluntarily and intentionally.

tags.name: Denpa
tags.description: Works that feature themes of social dissociation, delusions, and other issues like suicide, bullying, self-isolation, paranoia, and technological necessity in daily lives. Classic iconography: telephone poles, rooftops, and trains.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

node.description:
[Website (FLAT STUDIO)](http://flatstudio.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/loundraw) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=772547) | [Tumblr](http://loundrawblr.tumblr.com)

Illustrator who made his professional debut in his teens with a cover illustration for Gara Nagata's _Hoshi no Nemuru Mizuumi e -Ai wo Sagashi ni-_. He also worked on the covers of various novels, such as Keigo Higashino’s _Koi no Gondola_ and Yoru Sumino’s _Kimi no Suizou wo Tabetai_.

He is also active in other creative areas like music, where he is part of the artist group CHRONICLE. At the end of 2016, he published his first art book ‘Hello, light. ~loundraw art works~’.

In January 2019, he established the animation studio FLAT STUDIO with [Tetsuya Sano](https://anilist.co/staff/126059/Tetsuya-Sano) also joining the studio.

In February of 2021 he launched "PROJECT COMMON", a multimedia project with the theme of "expressing the true loundraw"
Otsuichi is the pen name of Hirotaka Adachi (安達 寛高), born 1978 who is a popular horror short story writer as well as a filmmaker. His most popular work is the novel Goth.
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/akira_kosemura) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/akirakosemura/) | [Website](https://akirakosemura.com)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kojima_oresama) | [Website](https://hideyakojima.jp/)

title.native: 花とアリス 殺人事件
ペンギン・ハイウェイ
さよならの朝に約束の花をかざろう
雲のむこう、約束の場所
シン・エヴァンゲリオン劇場版:||
あの日見た花の名前を僕達はまだ知らない。
心が叫びたがってるんだ。
グッバイ、ドン・グリーズ！
打ち上げ花火、下から見るか？横から見るか？
